entities: JPMorgan Chase, Citi, Morgan Stanley, SitusAMC
topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: SitusAMC, a technology vendor for real estate financiers, suffered a cyberattack on November 12, 2025, potentially exposing client data, including accounting documents and legal contracts, for major clients such as JPMorgan Chase, Citi, and Morgan Stanley. SitusAMC confirmed the breach, alerted law enforcement and the FBI, and reported no impact on banking operations.Sources: - https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m6cdtj6h7d2f - https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m6cdtkqce32t - https://www.reuters.com/business/fin - https://www.situsamc.com/databreach
